welcome_message_body: "Welcome to San Marino, the charming city known for its rich history and scenic beauty. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay here."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Monte Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at El Monte Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whiteman Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Whiteman Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bob Hope Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Bob Hope Airport is primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Compton Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Compton Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Tom Bradley International Terminal
terminals.description: The largest and newest terminal at LAX, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Serving domestic airlines such as Southwest and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international airlines such as Delta and Aeromexico.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international airlines such as American and Avianca.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international airlines such as United and Air Canada.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international airlines such as Alaska and Hawaiian.

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international airlines such as Virgin America and Volaris.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international airlines such as United and Copa.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international airlines such as United and Qantas.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Daugherty Field Terminal
terminals.description: The Daugherty Field Terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves all general aviation and private flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free wifi network by selecting 'LGB-Free-Wifi' and agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Van Nuys Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Van Nuys Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrance Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Hangars
terminals.description: A section of the airport dedicated to private hangars for aircraft storage.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Monica Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The north terminal at Santa Monica Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Ynez Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Santa Ynez Airport caters to private and charter flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as Southwest, United, and Delta.
